name: Rixas
description:
This game is currently made by one person, Elfkan. The idea was always there since I was young and I announced the Rixas project in 2019, due to my inexperience at the time I wasn't really able to take it off the ground. In 2022, the project was completely restarted from scratch and I can't wait to see where it goes next!

I believe that such a dream project of many should be shared for free, but if you do have the financial ability, please do support me. I quite enjoy existing.

Ko-fi Disclaimer

Rixas does not intend to 100% simulate reality or be use as an accurate tool for firearms design. Please do not use Rixas as a real firearm building tool. You will get hurt. We do not take any responsibility for any damages caused.
